snippet.title: Home Blood Pressure Monitoring
snippet.description: * Home Blood Pressure Monitoring When you visit your doctor, it’s nearly a sure bet that you’ll have your blood pressure measured. A high blood pressure reading usually means that you have hypertension, but sometimes the problem is all in your head. The term “white coat hypertension...

snippet.title: Caring for the Caregivers
snippet.description: * Caring for the Caregivers In my practice of cardiology, I take care of many elderly men and women. snippet.description: * More Bad News for Smokers: Breast Cancer Risk Rises I am always looking for new angles to use to help my patients to quit smoking. snippet.description: * Childhood Obesity: It Doesn’t Have To Be A Life Sentence Childhood obesity is an unnatural disaster of literally epic proportions.
